name: pillow

about.summary: Pillow is the friendly PIL fork by Alex Clark and Contributors
Pillow is the friendly PIL fork by Alex Clark and Contributors

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  version: "11.3.0"
      
recipe:
  name: pillow-split
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/python-pillow/Pillow/archive/refs/tags/${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: fa4aca745b1e1c733589ebf0ef19491b145dd4225c4aa06958963b4e7f0734cf
  patches:
    - patches/0001-Build-without-USE_WIN32_FILEIO.patch
    # fix provided by upstream maintainer for failing test
    - patches/0002-Added-patch-to-fix-failing-Windows-test.patch
    # windows needs help detecting webpmux & xcb
    - patches/0003-add-XCB_ROOT.patch

build:
  number: 3

outputs:
  - package:
      name: pillow
    build:
      script: 
        - if: unix
          then: build_pillow.sh
          else: build_pillow.bat
    requirements:
      build:
        - if: build_platform != target_platform
          then: python
        - if: build_platform != target_platform
          then: cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - ${{ compiler('c') }}
        - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
      host:
        - python
        - pip
        - setuptools >=77
        # libraries, c.f. https://github.com/python-pillow/Pillow/blob/9.0.0/setup.py#L30-L38
        - freetype
        # fribidi and libimagequant disabled due to
        # GPL discussion, see #109 and #111
        # - fribidi
        - libjpeg-turbo
        - openjpeg
        - lcms2
        # not available elsewhere
        # currently disabled on windows due to libimagequant depending on llvm-openmp, see
        # https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/72293
        # - libimagequant  # [x86_64 and not win]
        - libtiff
        - libwebp
        - libxcb
        - tk
        - zlib
      run:
        - python
    tests:
      - python:
          imports:
            - PIL
            - PIL.Image
            - PIL.ImageCms

  - package:
      name: pillow-tests
    requirements:
      run:
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("pillow", exact=True) }}
    tests:
      - files:
          source:
            # from upstream repo
            - Tests/
          recipe:
            # from recipe; some images cannot be in upstream repo, see Tests/README
            - Tests/images
        requirements:
          run:
            - pytest
            - pytest-timeout
            # test dependency, see Tests/test_image_access.py
            - setuptools
            - ${{ compiler('c') }}
            # for run_test.py
            - fsspec
            - requests
        script:
          interpreter: python
          content:
            - import sys, pytest
            - 'tests_to_skip = ["_not_a_real_test"]'
            - if: win
              then: 
                # compile smoke test failing to link python3x.lib
                - 'tests_to_skip.append("test_embeddable")'
                # #165: hard fail with no feedback on windows
                - 'tests_to_skip.append("test_save_zero")'
            - if: linux
              then:
                # the following needs a viewer which we don't have
                - 'tests_to_skip.append("(test_imageshow and test_show)")'
            - if: not osx
              then:
                # this test is a known failure with libjpeg_turbo, but only marked as such for 2.0 upstream, not 2.x, see
                # https://github.com/python-pillow/Pillow/blob/9.3.0/Tests/test_file_libtiff.py#L885-L891
                - 'tests_to_skip.append("test_strip_ycbcr_jpeg_2x2_sampling")'
            # skip test that requires an image incorrectly flagged by AV
            - 'tests_to_skip.append("(test_tiff_crashes and crash-81154a65438ba5aaeca73fd502fa4850fbde60f8.tif)")'
            # skip test that requires a missing image
            - 'tests_to_skip.append("test_tiff_mmap")'
            # Freetype 2.14.* broke some tests https://github.com/python-pillow/Pillow/issues/9205
            # some tests need updating in pillow itself
            # FUTURE: skip for now but readd in pillow 11.4.0 or so
            - 'tests_to_skip.append("test_default_font_size")'
            - 'tests_to_skip.append("test_colr")'
            - 'tests_to_skip.append("test_colr_mask")'
            - 'tests_to_skip.append("test_default_font")'
            - sys.exit(pytest.main(["-v", "-k", f"not ({' or '.join(tests_to_skip)})"]))

about:
  license: HPND
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Pillow is the friendly PIL fork by Alex Clark and Contributors
  homepage: https://pillow.readthedocs.io
  repository: https://github.com/python-pillow/Pillow/

extra:
  feedstock-name: pillow
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jakirkham
    - patricksnape
    - pelson
    - ocefpaf
    - h-vetinari
